title: Spanking: A Loving Discipline : Helpful and Practical Answers for Today's Parents
description: A Guide to Biblical Discipline For all Christian parents who wonder how to discipline their young children, Roy Lessin clearly explains the biblical mandate to "train children in the way they should go" and how spanking is one part of that mandate. Lessin teaches parents when and how to spank in a way that helps children learn to obey. Just as important, he teaches when not to spank, including a straightforward, helpful distinction between loving discipline and child abuse. Practical and easy-to-follow instruction, including answers to frequently asked questions about spanking, makes this an excellent resource for parents who desire to raise their children in God's way.
author: Roy Lessin
